com.kakao.plusfriend

Class PlusFriendService

  • package com.kakao.plusfriend
public class PlusFriendService
extends Object
    Class for adding plus friend or chatting with plus friend. This class provides methods for 1) opening a plus friend bridge page in browser, which will call KakaoTalk custom scheme for adding or chatting. 2) creating urls for plus friend bridge page.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
      Constructor and Description
      PlusFriendService() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFriend(Context context, String plusFriendId)
      Opens a bridge page in browser for adding a speicifed plus friend.
      Uri addFriendUrl(Context context, String plusFriendId)
      Returns a url of plus friend bridge page for addFriend(Context, String)
      void chat(Context context, String plusFriendId)
      Opens a bridge page in browser for 1:1 chat with a specified plus friend.
      Uri chatUrl(Context context, String plusFriendId)
      Returns a url of plus friend bridge page for chat(Context, String)
      static PlusFriendService getInstance()
      Returns a singleton PlusFriendService instance

    • Method Detail

      • public void addFriend(Context context,
             String plusFriendId)
               throws com.kakao.util.exception.KakaoException
        Opens a bridge page in browser for adding a speicifed plus friend. This bridge page will call KakaoTalk custom scheme.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to start custom tab or browser intent and get app configurations such as app key and key hash.
        plusFriendId - plus friend id (https://pf.kakao.com/${plusFriendId})
        Throws:
        com.kakao.util.exception.KakaoException - with KakaoException.ErrorType.ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT when context or plusFriendId is null
        com.kakao.util.exception.KakaoException - with KakaoException.ErrorType.MISS_CONFIGURATION when required app configuration such as kakao app keys is not correctly set
      • public Uri addFriendUrl(Context context,
               String plusFriendId)
                 throws com.kakao.util.exception.KakaoException
        Returns a url of plus friend bridge page for addFriend(Context, String)
        Parameters:
        context - Context to start custom tab or browser intent and get app configurations such as app key and key hash.
        plusFriendId - plus friend id (https://pf.kakao.com/${plusFriendId})
        Returns:
        uri
        Throws:
        com.kakao.util.exception.KakaoException - with KakaoException.ErrorType.ILLEGAL_ARGUMENT when context or plusFriendId is null
        com.kakao.util.exception.KakaoException - with KakaoException.ErrorType.MISS_CONFIGURATION when required app configuration such as kakao app keys is not correctly set
      • public void chat(Context context,
        String plusFriendId)
          throws com.kakao.util.exception.KakaoException
        Opens a bridge page in browser for 1:1 chat with a specified plus friend. This bridge page will call KakaoTalk custom scheme.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to start custom tab or browser intent and get app configurations such as app key and key hash.
        plusFriendId - plus friend id (https://pf.kakao.com/${plusFriendId})
